com.heaton.bot.catbot
Class Recognize

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.catbot.Recognize
Direct Known Subclasses:
RecognizeCountry, RecognizeLink
public abstract class Recognize
extends java.lang.Object

This class forms the base class for all recognizers. Recognizers are an important concept for the CatBot. A recoginzer is a class that can recognize and extract data from certian types of page. The recogizer will provide the page with the needed information so that the CatBot can continue.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
